name: Little Wanderer (gabby6)
description:
This is a walking simulator where you are playing as a character that is the size of an ant. Walk around the backyard to explore and discover your environment.

The goals of this game is to provide a sense of uncertainty and unknown, yet still allowing the player to explore as they wish.

Assets are not my own.

Player Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Shift to sprint

Enjoy the game, and thank you for playing!
